name: Arvetta Washington
text: All the Dr are great good Spirits great Personality i Love them

name: Pamela Parnell
text: He takes time to explain things to you. Gives you his full attention.

name: teri trefftzs
text: My Mother went into surgery and chemo treatment through Dr. Finan with an open mind and heart.  Dr. Finan was sure to give her hugs and promises in the beginning.  My Mother was completely sold!!! However, when her cancer reocurred 3 months after chemo ended, it was a complete turnaround in his attitude and demeanor.  I felt so sorry sitting there seeing him shrug his shoulders and push her questions off to staff.  If you're going to use Dr. Finan, let's hope you're a "success story" for him.  Otherwise, you might as well have never darkened his doorstep.  You will leave feeling that way; my family and my Mother can attest to that.

name: Erma Mcmichael
text: Dr finan is an God sent 👼. You could not ask for a more compassionate doctor than hi.

name: Mark Cecil
text: I have never in my life met a doctor with better bedside manner. My hat is off to him and his staff.. I only gave a 5 star because I couldn't give a 10.

name: Gayle Smith
text:
Dr. Huddleston has been thorough, caring, compassionate as well as his wonderful staff.  In after care Dr. Huddleston remains interested in seeing me regain my strength as well as helpful regarding my emotional health.

How do you love an Oncologist?  Under his care you will quickly know.

name: Helen Trammell
text:
"Loved it"  excessive in regards to being treated for cancer. But.....

Dr. Adam Huddleston had answers to every question. With my husband having completed 2 years of treatment for brain cancer I think I had experience to determine if this was a doctor I wanted to work with. He is, I am. Dr. Huddleston relayed the most recent 10 year study of Canadian & USA radiation treatment enabling me to choose 21 vs 35 sessions. That means a lot to me!

name: Debra Caldwell
text: Dr.Huddleston is the best.He helped me get through  my throat cancer.He truly cares about his patients.

name: Howard Thomas
text: Dr. Crew is the most intelligent and compassionate doctor I have  ever  met. He communicates openly and honestly and follows through in both an effective and efficient manner. Imagine receiving a follow up call from an Oncologist! Wow, he and his team simply blows my mind with their competence, compassion, and professionalism!

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review! We hope you have a great day!

name: Larry Gibson
text: Great doctor! From my initial diagnosis thru treatments and now with followup appointments 2 1/2 years later, he has shown true compassion and concern for not only me but for my wife and kids as well. I would recommend him to anyone!

resp.text: Hi Larry Gibson, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at John Crew, MD. We're happy we could meet your expectations! Please don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything additional we can do for you.

name: Charles Fulford
text: We were met on time for our appointment, but met with an administrator for the first 15 or so minutes.  My wife and I were impressed with both Dr. Crew and his nurse Deidra, as well as all that we communicated with.  All were pleasant, informative and most of all positive concerning my needs and treatment.

resp.text: Hello Charles Fulford, we appreciate you taking the time to leave us this feedback. If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to reach out!

name: Bruce Vick
text: The best staff you can expect from any where you may go. Clerical, nursing, radiologist, Dr Crew is by far the most courteous professional that I have had the pleasure to meet. This team of professionals are at the top, A1.

resp.text: Hi Bruce Vick, thank you for taking the time to leave a review for us at John Crew, MD. We're happy we could meet your expectations! Until the next time we meet, take care!

name: David Fincher
text:
Dr. Crew is a good doctor with a good staff.  Look forward to being his patience.  He studied my situation and knew my situation in detail.  he instructed me on what to do.  I thank Dr. L. Robert Pernia for sending me to Dr. Crew.

My Second Visit back to Dr. Crews office(on 10/14) was as good or better than my first.  I go back on the 21st and look forward to another good visit.

12/08/20 - Another good example with Dr. Crew and his staff.  Thanks to all.

resp.text: David Fincher, reviews like this give us motivation and help us ensure we provide high-quality care.

name: Consuela Tyree
text: Although this was a mind blowing experience, Dr. Crew and the staff was very thorough and the situation a little more comfortable.

resp.text: Consuela Tyree, we really appreciate your feedback!

name: Peggy Snider
text: EVERYONE was so friendly and  helpful. Dr. Crew spent much of his valuable time and knowledge with us.  We are so thankful we found Dr. Crew for our loved one.  The facility is also uplifting, not sterile in appearance.

resp.text: Hello Peggy Snider, we appreciate you taking the time to leave us this feedback. Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you; we are more than happy to help!

name: George Simmons
text: I still have issues with some that work there but all and all I am very pleased with the way everything turned out and I will continue to support my ladies at the center.

resp.text: Hello George Simmons, we appreciate you taking the time to leave us this feedback. If there are concerns that we can address, please reach out to us at info@dchsystem.com. Thanks!

name: Addison Willmon
text: Dr. Crew was very to-the-point and helpful in his evaluation.

resp.text: Hello Addison Willmon, we appreciate you taking the time to leave us this feedback. Thank you, and have a fantastic day!

name: Michelle Carroll
text: Caring and compassionate people that take great care of you!

resp.text: Michelle Carroll, It is great to see you had such a positive experience at John Crew, MD.

name: Elaine Miles
text:
Dr. Crew is an amazing doctor! During every visit I had with him, he showed outstanding compassion, kindness, and exceptional thoughtfulness and professionalism. I am so grateful to be alive and he had an important role in that happening by being on my oncology team. He patiently answered all of my questions and gave me expert quality care throughout my journey. I am extremely grateful to Dr. Crew for his contribution to the wonderful and loving care I received which resulted in saving my life.

Dr. Crews’ staff is awesome as well and were organized and efficient during my treatments. His ‘crew’ was very positive and treated me with kindness and dignity throughout my treatments. I had thirty radiation treatments, but they were so upbeat with playing music and smiling, that the time just flew by! I really appreciate that they put their hearts into their work and gave me quality and compassionate care.

name: Sandra Perritt
text: Barely and wait time.  Staff was pleasant & courteous.

resp.text: Thank you for the positive review! We appreciate your feedback.

name: Weldon Cole
text: I was admitted promptly, the nurse was efficient and courteous. Dr. Crew was patient, helpful and caring in reviewing my status. He called with my test results before the day ended. The experience could not have been more positive.

name: Anita Channell
text: Dr. Crew is a compassionate and caring physician.  I knew I was in very good hands from the moment I met him!  EVERY MEMBER of his staff was professional and experienced yet very warm, friendly and inviting.  I never had to wait on them - they were always ready for me.  Honestly, I hated to leave them, even though I was glad to have completed that part of my journey.

name: Barbara Holden
text: I have been treated with respect & understanding! Very professional staff! So glad they are taking care of me.Dr Crew is fantastic & compassionate. So glad to have them walking with me on this new journey in my life😊

name: Cathy Swanson
text: Dr Crew is a wonderful, caring, concerned and interested Physician.  He always made me feel safe and secure with my diagnosis!  He was extremely informative and attentive. His staff were as professional and attentive as he was!  I was honored to be his patient!

resp.text: Cathy Swanson, we are very happy we could provide you with a positive experience! Please don't hesitate to reach out if there's anything additional we can do for you.

name: Michael Tidmore
text: Dr. Crew was very personable, thorough in explaining each detail, & listened attentively to our concerns and questions.

name: Tuwana Lyons
text: Everyone was so nice and helpful. The staff was caring and Dr Crew really listen to my concerns. I was very pleased with the care he and his staff provided.

name: BILLY CORK
text: I've had a fantastic experience  with Dr John Crew and his staff al thru treatments I will suggest this establishment  to anybody.

name: j k
text: Dr. Crew did a fantastic job in explaining my situation.  While it was not what I really wanted to hear, he came across very genuine and interested in my personal well being and recommended what he thought best for my case.   Thanks DR!

name: Web Stats
text:
I was diagnosed with stage 4 lung cancer back in February 2018 and saw Dr Crew on my first visit to DCH. He immediately identified a lump on the lymph node on my neck that was pressing on the main vein and arranged for treatment to start that week. I've no doubt that his quick actions saved my life back then. The main thing I can summarize about Dr Crew is that he treats the patient and not just the disease. If you want him to tell it to you straight, he will tell it to you straight but not in a medical dictionary way. Both myself and my family have found him easy to talk to; he brings bedside manner to a whole new level considering the nature of the diagnosis

The staff and nurses at the radiation clinic are brilliant too; always happy and willing to share a joke with you (they even laughed at mine!).

I cannot recommend Dr Crew and the radiation clinic at DCH enough.

name: Curtis White
text: Sincere, professional explained things and answered all of my questions.

resp.text: Thank you so much for the positive review! Thank you, and have a fantastic day!

name: Eric Thompson
text: Dr. Crew and his staff have been wonderful.  Everyone there has taken time to know me and to see that my treatment plan met my needs. Dr. Crew is extremely knowledgable and he answers all of my questions. I would recommend  Dr. Crew and his first class team and facility at Manderson to anyone.

name: Linda Nevin
text: Dr. Crew is one of the kindest and most compassionate doctors that I have ever met. He is excellent at what he does, and takes the time to answer all questions.

name: l r
text: Every member of the staff treats patients with kindness and care. Dr. Crew takes his time to really explain things, checks on his patients between visits and answers any questions or concerns. Makes a stressful time much more bearable,you really feel like they are on your side.

name: Kitty Whitehurst
text: The professionals are exceptionally kind, knowledgeable, and efficient.  Each one treats us like family.  The facility is inviting and comfortable.

name: Peter Hindman
text: Always a great experience with Dr Crew.  Shelley and I would highly recommend him and his staff.  Always very personable and caring.

name: carrollmmcarroll
text: Everyone I came into contact with was very kind and helpful.

name: Jerry Clark
text: Everyone was very nice and friendly.   Also willingly answered all of our questions.

name: Brooke Bentley
text: Dr John Crew is my Oncologist who specializes in treating with Radiation.  He is part of a wonderful group of Oncologist that practice at DCH Cancer Center a member of the MD Anderson Cancer Centers based in Houston Texas.  Dr Crew shows he cares for his patients and is very involved in all aspects of the treatment process.  Dr John Dubay was in charge of my Chemotherapy as is equally committed to destroying Cancer in his patients. I couldnt say enough about either doctor or the Nurses and Technicians that provide the utmost care during the treatment and aftercare.

name: Felicia Allen
text: Truly a caring doctor supported by a warm and friendly staff.   Definitely what is needed when fighting cancer.

name: Betty Colley
text: Everyone is always so nice and helpful with a smile on their face

name: Laura M
text: Everyone was very kind and considerate.

name: Cathey Sanford
text: WE did not see Dr. Crew, we saw Ginger.  They are both awesome.

text: Very caring and concerned not only for physical health but emotional and mental health.

resp.text: Reviews like this give us motivation and help us ensure we provide high-quality care. Feel free to reach out to us at info@dchsystem.com if you need anything. Have a wonderful day!

name: Joel Thacker
text: everyone very nice with a smile. never a long wait.

name: Barry Newsom
text: Excellent care and all the staff are caring and attentive. Could not ask for better care.

resp.text: Barry, we are so pleased you enjoyed your visit to John Crew, MD! Please let us know if there is anything else we can do for you; we are more than happy to help!

name: Sara W Malone
text: Dr. Crew Is an "Awesome"  Physician with an excellent  professional staff!

name: Terri Cornell
text: Dr Crew and his Staff are wonderful,caring people. I would refer anyone to Dr Crew

name: Dale Glover
text: Thank you, Dr Crew, for an excellent appointment in every area!!

name: Jack Kapphan
text: Consummate professionals both staff and Dr. Crew.

name: Wilburn Lane
text: I have appointment on April 27th at VA ENT at 12:00pm.

name: Rich Prodoehl
text: Hi is absolutely great.Skilled , dedicated and compassionate.

resp.text: Thank you for taking the time to let us know you had a great experience. We try very hard every day, and with every guest, to make sure we provide that 5-star experience!

name: Roy Sanford
text: Great visit

name: Rody Daw
text: I wanted to update this review and direct it to all of the employees of this establishment! From the bottom of my heart I want to thank each and every one of you here in Andalusia. I pray for you everyday that's passed since Amy's passed on, you were her strength and her one personal hope to succeed in always fighting her leukemia. She always spoke highly of you Dr. Boatwright, and the whole team with you. Towards the end I wanted to let you know I had become so angry with this cancer of hers and a part of me wouldn't listen to any kind of words of defeat and I want to apologize for anything 😞 I may have said or done at the time! I pray that you could find it to forgive me one day for not doing more when it meant the most. I'm very sorry... If you can't then I absolutely understand and I would do the same if I were who I used to be. Amy didn't really have a great deal of friends or family besides her kids and their dad was always using them against her. I watched day in and day out of her struggle and almost everyday I had to go hide for a little while and cry my eyes out. And I knew it was coming in my mind and that haunted me so bad because I didn't want to live without her. To this very day 4 months after the grief and this horrific game of circle is at an all time high and her death has been difficult to bear. Thank you ❤️ Sacred Heart for always being there for her and for going above and beyond for every detail of her struggle! I'll forever be in your debt. They'll never be another day that I don't thank and pray for all of you. And if anyone out there has need for there care I promise you'll be making a very wise decision here! God Bless you all and may everyday of yours be blessed. Sincerely Rody

name: Jamie Cardwell
text: Seems to be a communication issue amongst staff and patients.. Lab tech was very unprofessional and rude.

name: Arnold Clewell
text: Kind and professional staff

name: emily
text: Be careful a nurse named Jessica Rodgers was looking for fake covid 19 vaccination cards in order to not get her vaccine. She is putting you and your loved ones at risk so just be careful!!!!

name: Daniel Anderson
text: They are a very nice place to have your treatment done and they have the best doctor's they are very friendly there and they care about your health I highly recommend this place to everyone that is fighting cancer

name: tierren blakely
text: I had the very best experience when taking chemotherapy here. From the time you pull up at the door someone is there to greet you. Dr. Butler was my oncologist he’s so awesome. They made my experience as pleasant as possible and unforgettable in the best way! Everyone was amazing! Thank you all!

name: Judy Lynn
text: David Clarkson was the best dr my late husband could of had in my opinion

name: Lillian Jones
text: I have been going to Mitchell Cancer since 2014, they have been wonderful to me and my husband    you are in good hands when you go to Mitchell Cancer Center.

name: Seth Novak
text: This is the most horrible place to go doctor buttler is a lier they talk the talk but all in all they don't care about you I been suffering with pain for the past 6 years the hospitals lost my medical records and they pretty much called me a l liar sating because my medical records were lost they can't help me with my pain like I went and got all treatment for the hell of it because of this I rather die than get medical treated ever again

name: Clifford Kautz
text: The Mitchell Cancer Institute  made us feel at ease the lady vallet  gave us hugs   and even  gave me a warm blanket when we got there. They seemed like we were truly important and cared about all of our concerns. Children and Women's hospital were top notch as well. We were given hugs  and made my family feel at ease during my surgery and my 4 day stay. 100% satisfaction guaranteed!! May God bless everyone.

name: Mary Boyer Bellipanni
text: Dr. Finan no longer sees patients but he saved my life after I was diagnosed with ovarian cancer! He also was the doctor of my young friend and she was lucky enough to be able to have a baby. I came from 5 hours away and she 7 hours away just to see him! I trust him explicitely as does she! I highly recommend the doctors at Mitchell! Everyone I have ever met there has been very cordial and helpful! Please give them a call even if you suspect you have cancer! I wish I had called them FIRST and not had to have two operations!

name: Eric Voivedich
text: Just the best possible experience

name: Jeremy Kervin
text: Beautiful place and all oncologist are angels

name: Linda Jaynes
text:
(Translated by Google) I couldn't ask how to better cancer issue you do care Of me. Thank you Dr. Ove and yor nurse Michelle

(Original)
I couldnt hace ask forma a better cáncer tema ti hace talen Care Of me.  Thank you Dr.  Ove and yor nurse Michelle

name: Jason Duke
text: Just an amazing man and Dr. The entire staff is simply stellar! Compassionate, kind, understanding and empathetic are the core of their practice. Highly recommend.

name: Jennifer Begley
text: Dr. Butler & his team are amazing! They're friendly, available & trustworthy as well. They've gone above & beyond all expectations I had, based on previous providers I've seen!! Thanks so much!!

name: Richard C Dixon (Dickie, CaptD)
text: Great Doctor, great place, and Trust when I needed it most ! Thanks Dr Butler and staff!

name: Jennifer king
text: Never met a Dr. Like this Before. Just met the most caring, compassionate, explains his work with details. Answers all your questions with pure gentleness. Thank you God for  allowing us to meet Dr. Thomas Butler!  We're on the right path now. #Healingtime #ThankyouGod

name: Willow Noel
text:
Wonderful, caring, understanding, concerned.
What else do you need to know?

name: Jacinda Haines
text:
I gave this office a call seeking a second opinion about a procedure that my seven-year-old son was scheduled to have. I had some trepidation about the procedure, which was a colonoscopy to check for things like polyps, ect. I wanted to know if a proctologist could examine my son without anesthesia. They were more than helpful.

First of all, the nurse was very helpful in walking me through the steps necessary to book the appointment whether it was a referral, or a second opinion. Then, she began to ask me about the problem that my child was having. To my surprise, she handed the doctor the phone. I immediately felt as if I was being heard by the medical profession,  which is something that we have lost over time.

When the doctor picked up the phone, it was as if my son was already a patient of his. He asked me everything that was going on from the timeline to his symptoms. After listening to me, he assured me that I was on the right track with the colonoscopy.

He had every opportunity to schedule an appointment just because he could, as we were at such a vulnerable state. But he didn’t, and I respect and appreciated that. I can tell that this doctor really cares about his patients, their care, their results, their well-being, and he loves what he does!

If you watch his video, what he says lines up with what he delivered to me over a simple phone call. I can only imagine being his actual patient.

If you are looking for a proctologist, he is highly recommended!

Thank you Dr. Bornstein and you’re nursing staff!

We had my son’s colonoscopy, and everything came back well!

resp.text: Thanks for the great review! We are grateful to be able to deliver compassionate care for all.  Have a wonderful day! -Ascension Providence Community Manager

name: Ashley Whitfield
text: I've recently had a second proceedure with Dr. Joseph Bornstein, and, again, I am extremely grateful and pleased. He's a very compassionate doctor whose only concern, in my opinion, is the patient's overall health & well-being. He explains, in detail, EVERYTHING, and listens to your concerns about your health issues, then plans a strategy for better health. He's dynamic and his overall staff @Providence is amazing & friendly. I'm super happy that I was recommended to him and that he and his staff are really interested in each patient's wellness. If there were 10 stars to give, they'd have them all!

resp.text: Thank you for the positive review! We work hard to provide high quality care. And we are committed to delivering compassionate care to the community. -Ascension Providence Community Manager

name: Joyce Saviak
text: My husband was recently diagnosed with cancer.  This is a time when you need someone who is not only skilled but compassionate.  We found Dr. Bornstein  and his staff to be all we need to face this and move forward.  He performed textbook surgery and was there to answer our questions and move us forward to the next step.  Very grateful to have found a great surgeon and a doctor who takes all the time you need to help understand what is happening.  Highly recommend.

resp.text: Thanks for taking the time to leave us positive feedback! Have a great day! -Providence Health System Community Manager

name: GG Nelson
text: Fantastic doctor!  He is young BUT know his medical information.  Been to two other doctors that couldn’t diagnose my problem and wanted to operate to explore.  Dr Bornstein studied my test and took a look and examined my problem and told me exactly what was wrong.  No surgery needed   I highly recommend him and if I ever need a general surgeon Dr Bornstein is mine

resp.text: Thank you; we appreciate your feedback! We will share it with our leadership. -Providence Health System Community Manager

name: patricia neel
text: I was referred to Dr. Bornstein by another surgeon, best referral I've every received. He is professional, personable but most of all a very good surgeon.  His willingness to take the time to explain every aspect of my surgery left me with no questions and feeling confident in having the surgery.  I  have always found him willing to take as much time as needed to answer any questions you might have.  I am very grateful to have found such a caring and giving doctor.  I would recommend him without hesitation.

resp.text: Patricia, thank you for sharing your observations with us. Feedback helps us know what we’re doing right or where we need to improve.

name: Sharon Henderson
text: Dr Bornstein  took the time to sat down and explain everything with me I would recommend him to anyone great Doctor

resp.text: We are glad we were able to help! -Providence Health System Community Manager

name: Gaelene Conley
text: Great surgeon. He performed unexpected emergency surgery for me, and did a great job. He's very straightforward, so if you need your health information sugar coated, he may not be your person; but if you want to know what is really going on, he's great.

resp.text: Gaelene Conley, thank you for taking the time to review us and for the positive rating.

name: Lance bell
text: My procedure and everything around it was perfect the robotic surgery was amazingly painless in recovery

resp.text: We appreciate you taking the time to leave us this feedback. Thank you. -Providence Health System Community Manager

name: pam sillings
text: He is great in every way. Gloes out of his way to make you comfortable.  Spends time with you.he does everthing in a great way that we walk away from every other dr. Complaining about . Hes a wonderful Dr.

resp.text: Thank you for the high star rating!

name: Elizabeth Hensell
text: I have to say Dr bornstien can kinda give you a mixed feeling the first visit because he's very nice but also very forward and don't try to soften what you have going on . I personally didn't know what to think the first time seeing him. but soon had to return and ended up needing a hemmroidextomy he was very very honest about everything as to were most doctors would sugar coat it . It scared me but I also appreciate his honesty because if he wouldn't have been I would have never been prepared for what I have had done so I thank him greatly. He's super nice but super straight to the point.

name: Andre Provost
text:
A number one in my book.
Courteous , answers questions with no reservation, very professional and
I would recommend to anyone.
Great surgeon

name: Pattie Suthoff
text:
I met Dr. Bornstein because he was on call for a surgeon I had used in the past. He was kind and interested in my case. When it came time to deal with my case with "surgery" he really did not want to put me to sleep due to the risk
If general anesthesia.... I had had a bad experience in the past having this type of procedure without anesthesia, so I was not convinced... I am so glad that allowed him to provide my care and I trusted his expertise.
His name is in my phone and if the need arises he will hear from me again.... Thank you Dr. Bornstein for taking great care of me.
Mary Suthoff

name: Chuck
text: I meet him for a surgery that I might have to have. He told me the pros and cons. I like his bedside manner. And it didn't hurt he looked good!

name: Nikolai Wolfe
text: HORRIBLE !!!!!

name: Leigh Anne Layzod
text: Dr. Liles has been absolutely wonderful with my dad. Dr Liles is very patient, thorough, empathetic, and informative.  I would highly recommend him. My dad suffered neglect from another dermatologist and Dr Liles worked him into his surgery schedule within a week of seeing him for the initial  consult.

name: Betty Lafon
text: Very informative of  type of cancer my husband was dealing with plus friendly and complementary of husband's service USMC.  Was able to do the surgery the day that we arrived.  Pleased with the outcome.

name: Kristina Coleman
text: Dr. Liles is Awesome!

name: Mr. Bullard

text: Absolutely. he is the best Surgeon! I was lucky to be his Patient. Thank you Dr Tan for the best care You and you Staff have given me!

text: Dr. Tan is one of the most intelligent, well mannered and focused individuals i've ever encountered. His bedside manner is top notch, making me feel comfortable and optimistic. He's incredible.

text: Dr.Tan is awesome he made sure my friend was well taking care of and Thank you!
